messages.subject: Re: NE Conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/30/2003 9:30:57 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Rowe Center is very cool, but I think they mostly develop their own conferences. I ll follow
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/30/2003 9:30:57 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> Someone mentioned the Rowe Conference Center, and that name rang a bell, so
> I
> asked around. It turns out that an unschooler from the old AOL days
> (Wolfsong) recently relocated there with her family (one unschooled child)
> to
> work.
>
> That would be cool to have an unschooling conference at a center run by an
> unschooler!
>

Rowe Center is very cool, but I think they mostly develop their own
conferences. I'll follow up on it, but I don't think it's an option.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] NE Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Someone mentioned the Rowe Conference Center, and that name rang a bell, so I asked around.  It turns out that an unschooler from the old AOL days (Wolfsong)
messages.messageBody:
Someone mentioned the Rowe Conference Center, and that name rang a bell, so I
asked around. It turns out that an unschooler from the old AOL days
(Wolfsong) recently relocated there with her family (one unschooled child) to
work.

That would be cool to have an unschooling conference at a center run by an
unschooler!

Tuck


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: NE Conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/29/03 8:10:17 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/29/03 8:10:17 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
writes:

<< They're called "leaf-peepers" in the NE.

Place is a zoo all fall.

~Kelly >>

Not for all of fall. It's only a zoo here in the first couple of weeks when
the leaves just turn then it settles down.
Kim
